title: Aries
text: The stars will smile upon you today, dear Aries, as the moon moves through your sign.

title: Taurus
text: You'll feel the winds of change upon you today, dear Taurus

title: Gemini
text: The universe will ask you to make your presence known today, dear Gemini

title: Cancer
text: The Aries moon connects with Mars this morning, dear Crab you pursue goals and exchange ideas with your peers.

title: Leo
text: You'll have a chance to evolve any mild flirtations into something more concrete this morning, dear Leo

title: Virgo
text: The universe will ask you to get strict with yourself this morning, dear Virgo, as the Aries moon connects with Saturn

title: Libra
text: Your romantic and platonic relationships will offer you stability this morning, dear Libra.

title: Scorpio
text: Organizing your space will bring a sense of stability this morning, dear Scorpio.

title: Sagittarius
text: Try to bring stability to your creative visions today, dear Archer.These vibes are perfect for indulging the artist that lives within

title: Capricorn
text: Don't feel guilty about indulging the hermit that lives within, dear Capricorn, as the Aries moon blows a kiss to Saturn.

title: Aquarius
text: Your mind will feel sharp when you awaken this morning, dear Aquarius, thanks to a sweet alliance

title: Picses
text: You'll have an opportunity to stand your ground this morning, dear Pisces, as the Aries moon connects with Saturn.
